title: Setup +
content:
TurnOff HDD
```
sudo chown root:root /sbin/hdparm
sudo chmod 4775 /sbin/hdparm
```
<hr>

TLP
```
sudo apt-get install tlp tlp-rdw acpi-call-dkms -y
sudo tlp start
```
```
sudo gedit /etc/tlp.conf
```
`DEVICES_TO_DISABLE_ON_LAN_CONNECT="wifi wwan"`
<hr>

iuvolt
```
sudo apt install msr-tools bc -y
```
```
sudo modprobe msr
```
```
git clone https://github.com/tiziw/iuvolt.git
cd iuvolt && sudo chmod +x install.sh
sudo ./install.sh
```
```
sudo gedit /etc/iuvolt.cfg
```
`-107 -95 -107`

`95 -90 -95`
```
systemctl enable iuvolt.service
```
